name: No Brainer Podcast MINI
description:
No Brainer Podcast MINI

Are you tired of waiting for the next No Brainer Podcast episode!??!?!

Well wait no more! With the new No Brainer Podcast MINI based on the No Brainer podcast featuring Cure, pikkle, Ruli, Rubber Bandz and Vonna

This game was based on @3honktwt's fanart of the podcast (with permission).

Controls Click on a person to play a note. Whilst holding down click, use the scroll wheel to change the person's note. Credits

No Brainer Podcast

Original Fanart
